effect: This unit is a House Hightower unit.
This unit is a House Redwyne unit.
This unit is a House Tarly unit.
Before rolling Attack Dice, you may search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 **Finesse and Focus** card and play it, or add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.
If this unit began the Turn unengaged, its Attacks gain **Critical Blow**.
Each time Mace's unit performs an Attack, 1 other unit in Long Range restores 1 Wound.
If the Defender suffers any Wounds from this Attack, they become **Weakened**.
This unit may always reroll Charge and Retreat Distance Dice.
After this unit completes a Ranged Attack, it may perform a 2" shift.
When Charging, this unit does not gain Charge Bonus on rolls of 3 or less.
• **Sundering**
• When Charging, rolls +2 Attack Dice.
• When Charging units with 1 rank, gains **Precision** and **Critical Blow**.
Loras' unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls and cannot become **Weakened**.
May always reroll any Attack Dice.
This unit begins the game with 1 Faith token. Each time it passes a Morale Test, it gains 1 Faith token. Faith tokens make be expended to gain the following:
• **When this unit it performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:**
This unit gains **Critical Blow** and may reroll any Attack Dice.
• **When this unit Activates:**
One unit in Short Range restores 2 Wounds
• While you Control [MONEY], gains **Precision**.
• While you Control [LETTER], the Defender may not be targeted by friendly Tactics cards.
• While you Control [SWORDS], may reroll any Attack Dice.

ORDER: FAR-EYE.trigger: When this unit is performing a Ranged Attack:
effect: If it did not perform a shift this Turn, this Attack suffers -1 to Hit and becomes [LONGRANGE].

ORDER: FIRST LINE OF DEFENSE.trigger: When this unit is performing a Melee Attack:
effect: If the Defender has not Activated this round they become **Weakened**.

ORDER: FLOGGING STRAGGLERS.trigger: When a friendly Infantry unit in Long Range Activates:
effect: It becomes **Panicked**. Until the end of the Round it gains +1 [MOVEMENT] and may pivot before Marching.

ORDER: FOR WE'RE GOING TO DIE TOMORROW.trigger: When a friendly unit in Short Range is performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Mace's unit suffers 2 Wounds. The Defender then suffers 1 Wound and gains 1 Condition token.
Target 1 enemy unit in Short Range and Lane of Sight. That unit becomes **Vulnerable**.
This unit restores +1 Wound.
While you Control [LETTER], each time this unit is Attacked, it may reroll any Defense Dice and opponents cannot expend **Panicked** tokens on this unit.
• This unit has 4 Wounds.
• At the start of this unit's Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.

fluff.lore: Highgarden is House Tyrell's seat of power. Aiding House Baratheon's claim to the Iron Throne, House Tyrell sent their Highgarden Pikemen. These highly trained fighters create a mobile wall of death on the battlefield, trained to perfection in the use of their pikes. Though lightly armored, the perseverance of the troops is without equal, making them a mainstay on the battlefield. Opponents can never truly county them out until all have been defeated.

As dedicated front-line units, the Rose Knights in service to King Renly come heavily armed and armored in the finest plate and brightest green that Renly's extensive purse allows. Hard training and fierce loyalty to their king keep these troops standing and fighting, even in the face of dire wounds. A commander should take care to keep them from being surrounded, but Rose Knights can take the hardest hits and return them twice over.

Thorn Watch crossbowmen are kitted out with mail shirts augmented with plate, longswords instead of traditional daggers or short blades of most archers, and unique crossbows. Indeed, they undergo more training to battle enemies in melee than most archers ever see. That said, the crossbow is their primary weapon, itself capable of puncturing even heavy armor, and wise commanders will employ them appropriately.

House Tyrell is steeped in chivalric traditions, and King Renly’s alliance to them by way of Lady Margaery has earned the loyalty of the famed Riders of Highgarden. While not as heavily armored as most cavalry, the Riders can mount a charge as devastating as anything other factions can muster. A commander should guard against allowing them to be bogged down in a protracted melee, but even then, their loyalty and bravery shine through.

When the Reach faces threats to its sovereignty, the Warden of the South turns to his most dependable levies: Men of the Mander. From the hills of Tumbletown to the majesty of Highgarden itself, the Mander River brings trade and transport to thousands of people. When their livelihood and prospertiy are threatened, those green civilians take up arms in defense of their homeland. Few foreign powers can stand against the sheer numbers of men willing to do so.

back_text.text: *May only be fielded in an army containing Talbert Serry. He must be attached to this unit.*
back_text.name: Character

fluff.lore: At the mouth of the Mander River lie the Shield Islands, named for their critical defensive position for the rest of the Reach. They are Greenshield, Greyshield, Oakenshield, and Southshield. The Men of the Shields, although not professional soliders, are still more experienced in warfare than their inland kin. Over the years, they remain ready to take to their warships at a moment's notice when threats from the sea are sighted.

The sigil of House Tarly is a striding red huntsman on green, and the House Tarly Huntsmen take their iconic role on the battlefield with rare skill befitting their heraldry. Few combatants can match the speed or skill of these marksmen, foregoing armor to make sure they are always ready to move at maximum speed for superior positioning.  Seasoned commanders know to keep these troops far away from melee combat and punish their foes from afar.

back_text.text: *Your army may only include 1 Knights of the Three Singers.*
back_text.name: Limited

fluff.lore: In the heart of Highgarden's godswood lie three ancient weirwood trees that have grown entangled over the ages.  The Knights of the Three Singers are an elite order who pray beneath their graceful branches of the trees before each battle, honoring both the Old Gods of the forest as well as the New Gods of their King. Their faith drives them to impressive acts of heroism on the battlefield and shines as an example to their comrades.

The famous Redwyne fleet is one of the largest armadas in Westeros and includes hundreds of warships. These mighty vessels are crewed by the equally impressive House Redwyne Marines. Proficient with bows and blades, these sailors must be just as lethal on choppy seas as other troops are on land. A marine must be able to fire accurately from one vessel to another and, when hulks collide, draw his sword to repel boarding parties.

Tyrell Captains are given the finest steeds from the stables at Highgarden and sent to lead vast detachments in battle. From atop their mounts, these leaders shout warnings and direction to the footsoliders below. If sections of a battle line begin to falter, these men will risk their lives to fill the gap and rally their compatriots back to the fight. A capable commander should protect them carefully.

The illustrious city of Oldtown is expertly protected by House Hightower Guards. These richly equipped and smartly trained soldiers approach their duty with viligance and skill. Slow-moving, and heavily armored, the guards are a truly immovable force when prepared. The denizens of Oldtown rest easy knowing that both the Citadel and the Hightower itself are secure under the watchful eye of these protectors.

The Lords of Highgarden rely on Lord Randyll Tarly of Horn Hill and he, in turn, relies on the House Tarly Enforcers. Each time another city is conquered by their liege and the Tarly banner is hung from the gates, these shrewd soldiers are quick to bring order to the populace at any cost. Those who would subvert this rightful order are worthy of neither pity, nor mercy. These troops will enforce justice without remorse.

On the lips of every jousting spectator in the land, Ser Loras Tyrell is the crowd favorite wherever he competes.  On the battlefield, any man who would suspect that Loras' tournament skill does not translate to field warefare will be mortally mistaken. Once enemy lines have broken before the legendary knight, none who flee before him will be spared his lance. Expert commanders will use him to best any solo combatants.

abilities.name: Voice of Oldtown
effect: **Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Leyton Hightower Influences a unit:
• While influencing an enemy unit, that unit may not be targeted by friendly Tactics cards.
• While Influencing an friendly unit, each time that unit is Attacked, after resolving that Attack, draw 1 Tactics card.

fluff.quote: "...preferring to rule his city from the clouds."

abilities.name: Pulling Weeds
effect: Each time Olenna Claims a zone, target 1 enemy NCU and choose 1:
• That NCU loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
• If that NCU Claims a zone this Round, before resolving that zone's effect, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They suffer D3 Hits and become **Weakened**.

fluff.quote: "All men are fools, if truth be told, but the ones in motley are more amusing than the ones in crowns."

abilities.name: A Rose and its Thorns
effect: Each time Margaery Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. They restore 1 Wound. You may then target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They become **Vulnerable**.

fluff.quote: "The girl is a maid of fourteen, sweet and beautiful and tractable." -Varys

abilities.name: Gentle, Pious, and Good-Hearted
effect: Each time Willas Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
Remove 1 Condition Token from that friendly unit, restore 2 Wounds (total) across any number of friendly units. Draw 1 Tactics card.

fluff.quote: "...Willas Tyrell will have Highgarden..."

abilities.name: Sensible and Prudent
effect: Mathis begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time Mathis Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, replace that zone's effect with:
1 friendly Combat Unit may perform 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action. Enemies this unit disengages from may not pivot and become **Weakened**.

fluff.quote: "Who shall have the van?"

abilities.name: Woodharp Melody
effect: **Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Leonette Influences a friendly Combat Unit:
This unit suffers -1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
All friendly units within Short Range gain +1 to Morale Tests.

fluff.quote: "Lady Leonette is too sweet." -Sansa Stark

abilities.name: A Rotund Distraction
effect: Once per game, at the start of any Round, you may immediately Activate Butterbumps. He may only Claim [MONEY] or [LETTER]. Do not resolve that zone's effect.
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, if Butterbumps is on the Tactics Board, you may move him to any unclaimed zone.

fluff.quote: "Catch them!"

abilities.name: Ravencraft Expertise
effect: Your maximum Tactics Hand size is increased by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when re-filling your hand.
Once per game, at the start of any Round, you may search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 Tactics card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

fluff.quote: "Maester Gormon sat below the iron mask in Walgrave's place..."

abilities.name: Ravens of the Citadel
effect: While Theobald is on the Tactics Board, you count as Controlling [LETTER].
Theobald begins the game with 2 Order tokens on him.
Each time Theobald Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, draw 1 Tactics card.

fluff.quote: "The Seneschal is an important man." -Alleras

abilities.name: War Machines at Sea
effect: Each time Paxter Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Make the following Ranged Attack on 1 enemy Combat Unit:*
[ATTACK:Ranged:Naval Volley:3+6]
*After resolving this Attack, choose 1 friendly unit engaged with the Defender. For each Miss, that unit suffers 1 Hit.*

fluff.quote: "Redwyne galleys closed the sea during the siege..." -Littlefinger
"I will never betray Renly, by word or deed."
"No one doubts your valor, Ser Loras..." -Eddard Stark
"A valiant deed unsung is no less valiant."

back_text.text: *Baelor Hightower, Brightsmile may only be fielded in an army that includes Leyton Hightower, Lord of the High Tower.*

fluff.quote: "Wealthy, handsome, and a knight of splendid repute."

attachment.name: Mace Tyrell
attachment.title: The Bard of Highgarden
abilities: Order: For We're Going to Die Tomorrow

fluff.quote: "...you would find none more loyal or true."
"Randyll Tarly is the finest solider in the realm." -Kevan Lannister
"...a great power in his own right."
"...he had it in him to be great..."
"As you command."
"Heartsbane must go to a man strong enough to wield her..." -Randyll Tarly

back_text.text: *Erryk ignores the usual Attachment restrictions when added to a unit containing Arryk.*
back_text.name: Character

fluff.quote: "My grandmother's personal guard." -Loras Tyrell

back_text.text: *Arryk ignores the usual Attachment restrictions when added to a unit containing Erryk.*
back_text.name: Character

fluff.quote: "Grandmother can't tell them apart..." -Loras Tyrell
"...a gallant from the Reach." - Meribald
"I would gladly take this challenge myself..."
"...climbed on the table and swore to slay Sandor Clegane in single combat."
"And who are you, kraken?"

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Choose 1. For each zone you Control among [LETTER] or [MONEY], choose +1:
• The Defender becomes **Vulnerable**.
• This Attack gains **Sundering**.
• This Attack may re-roll Attack Dice.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit passes a Morale Test:
effect: This unit restores 2 Wounds.
If you Control [LETTER], one enemy unit in Short Range gains 1 Condition token.
If you Control [MONEY], remove 1 Condition token from this unit.

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*Restore 3 Wounds (total) across any number of friendly units. 1 enemy unit then gains 1 Condition token.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack:
effect: For each Wound the Defender suffered, the Attacker suffers 1 Hit.
If you Control [LETTER], the Attacker suffers -1 to Defense Dice rolls against these Hits.

text.trigger: When an enemy NCU Activates:
effect: Choose 2 zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Turn, before resolving that zone's effect, target 1 enemy unit. That unit suffers D3 +2 Hits.
If you Control [LETTER] or [MONEY] you may reroll the D3.

text.trigger: Start of any turn:
effect: Attach this card to a friendly unit. When a friendly Infantry or Cavalry unit is destroyed, place 1 Order token on this card.

While this card has a token, each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice this unit restores 1 Wound. If you Control [MONEY], you may also remove 1 Condition token from this unit.

text.trigger: At the start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly unit. It performs 1 Morale Test. If it is in Short Range of your Commander's unit you may reroll any dice for this test. On a success, attach this card to that unit. When attached, place 2 Order tokens on this card. On a failure, the target restores 1 Wound.
When this unit is Attacked in the Front or Flank, before rolling Attack Dice, you may remove 1 token from this card. If you do, the Attacker suffers -1 to Hit.
Once all tokens have been removed from this card, immediately discard this card. This unit then restores 1 Wound.

text.trigger: When an enemy is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: That enemy performs 1 Morale Test. On a failure, they become **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.
If they are in Short Range of Loras Tyrell's unit, they suffer -2 to their roll.

text.trigger: Start of an enemy Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly unit. It performs 1 Morale Test. If it is engaged with an enemy with more remaining ranks, it passes this test.
On a success, attach this card to the friendly unit until the end of the game.
While attached, each time that unit is Attacked, before resolving that Attack, the Attacker suffers 1 Hit, +1 Hit for each of the Defender's remaining ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly Combat Unit Activates:
effect: All enemies engaged with this unit with the same or more remaining ranks become **Vulnerable**.
Then, this unit restores 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit Surges Forth:
effect: Instead of Surging Forth, that unit performs 1 Charge or March Action.
If this targets Loras Tyrell's unit, it may reroll any Charge Distance Dice.

text.trigger: When an unengaged friendly Cavalry Unit Activates:
effect: Once this Turn, if that unit performs a Maneuver Action, it gains +3 [MOVEMENT] for that Maneuver Action. Then it becomes **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: When a friendly Cavalry unit performs an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Instead of performing a Melee Attack, this unit immediately performs a Retreat Action
If this unit started the Turn engaged, before performing a Retreat Action, 1 engaged enemy suffers 2 Hits for each of this unit's remaining ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly Cavalry Unit performs an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains one of the following. If this targets Loras' unit, gain both:
• **Precision**
• +1 to Hit
After completing this Attack, if the Defender was not destroyed, your opponent may place 1 Condition Token on this unit.

text.remove: Before the game begins, remove the "Finesse and Focus" Tactics card from your Tactics Deck and replace it with this card.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit Activates
effect: Attach this card to that unit until they fail a Panic Test. While attached, when this unit performs a Melee Attack, gain the following for each enemy unit in Short Range *(effects are cumulative)*.
**1+:** This unit rolls +1 Attack Die
**2+:** This unit gains **Sundering**
**3+:** This unit may reroll any Attack Dice

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*1 friendly Combat Unit performs 1 Melee Attack Action using its lowest Attack Die Value.*
*If this targets Garlan Tyrell's unit, it may perform 1 Charge Action using its lowest Attack Die Value instead.*

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Charge Action, before rolling Charge Distance Dice:
effect: This unit automatically counts as rolling a 6 on all Charge Distance Dice and their Melee Attack gains **Critical Blow**.
After this Attack has been completed, unless the Attacker is Garlan Tyrell's unit, they become **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly unit, it may suffer up to 3 Wounds. Then choose 1. For each Wound suffered choose +1 *(effects may be chosen multiple times)*:
• Remove 1 Condition Token from 1 friendly unit in Short Range.
• Restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly unit in Short Range.
If this card targeted Mace's unit, effects become Long Range.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is Attacked, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Once the Attack is completed, this unit restores D3 Wounds.
If this unit would have been destroyed during the attack, it instead remains in play with 1 Wound and becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: When an infantry unit is performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This unit gains **Critical Blow** and **Sundering**.
After the Attack is completed, if the Defender was not destroyed, this unit suffers a Panic Test with -2 to their roll.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Attach this card to the enemy unit until they are targeted by [MONEY].
While attached, this unit suffers -1 to Morale Test rolls.
If this unit is engaged with a House Tarly unit it suffers an additional -1 to Panic Test rolls.
If this unit is engaged with Randyll Tarly's Unit it suffers an additional +1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes an Action:
effect: That unit gains 1 Condition Token for each House Tarly unit in Long Range.
If you Control [LETTER], 1 of those Tarly units may make a 2" shift.
If Randyll Tarly's unit is in Long Range, you may remove 1 Condition Token from his unit.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Draw 1 Tactics card.

text.trigger: When an enemy unit Activates:
effect: Target 1 friendly Infanry unit in Long Range, attach this card to that unit.
While attached, at the start of this unit's Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver Action. If it does, immediately discard this card.
If this is a House Tarly unit, this unit gains +1 [MOVEMENT].

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Discard this card and 1 other card to return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.
If you Control [LETTER], you only have to discard this card.

text.trigger: When an opponent targets a unit with a Tactics Zone:
effect: Roll a die. On a 3+, your opponent must target a different unit with that zone's effect *(if able)*.
If you Control [LETTER] you may reroll this die.
If the newly targeted unit is in Short Range of a Hightower unit, it gains a Condition token.

text.trigger: When a firendly NCU Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
effect: *Your opponent must reveal all Tactics cards from their hand.*
*Then, your opponent must discard 1 Tactics card from their hand.*

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Attach this card to a friendly House Redwyne Unit until the end of the game or until they fail a Panic Test. While attached, each time this unit Attacks, it rolls +1 Attack Die for each other House Redwyne Unit in Short Range.
If they are in Short Range of Paxter Redwyne's Unit, they gain +1 Attack Die.

text.trigger: When a House Redwyne unit Activates:
effect: Instead of this unit performing an Action this Turn, make the following Ranged Attack on 1 enemy Combat Unit.
[ATTACK:Ranged:Naval Ballista:3+1]
If this Attack generates any Hits, instead of rolling Defense Dice, the Defender suffers D3 Wounds, +1 Wound for each remaining rank in that unit.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: If the Attacker is a House Redwyne unit, the Defender becomes **Vulnerable**.
If this is a Melee Attack, the Attacker rolls its Highest Attack Die Value and the Defender becomes **Weakened**.
If this is a Ranged Attack, friendly units engaged with the Defender do not roll Panic Tests as a result of this Attack and the Defender becomes **Panicked**.
